This activity will play a random song from the library to the user. This will be achieved thanks to Music Player library (https://github.com/andremion/Music-Player)
This activity will show the user the most trending songs in recent time within the other users of the app

This activity will allow the user to become a premium user of the app, or to change settings of the premium account. Payment for the preium account will be handled thanks to Checkout (Android In-App Billing Library) (https://github.com/serso/android-checkout)
